### Statement of purpose

The Triangle Sports Analytics Competition aims to bring together students who love sports analytics to compete in a prediction contest. Students may work individually or in a team of 2-5. All submissions are due January TBD, 2025. Read details about the contest on the [Task](/task) page

### Timeline

Dates to be finalized. 

- August 2024: Registration opens
- October 2024: Attend welcome event
- November 2024: Pre-event workshop
- January 2025: Submissions due
- April 2025: Award ceremony
